narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Topeka Independent Living Resource Center is a Voluntary or Charitable provider based in Topeka, KS. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $46.8M in Medicaid payments across 548K claims.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $46.8M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
